message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30.  It's in your best interest to accept now, as the money will be worth less with each round.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's be reasonable - I'll take $45, you take $55. This deal makes sense considering the inflation.
Bob, this is your last chance for a good deal. I'll take $65, you get $35. The value keeps dropping, especially for you. Don't be greedy!
Alice, we're running out of time!  I'm willing to take $40 so we both get something. This is my final offer.
